mapper.update: UPDATE member SET grade = IFNULL( #{grade}, grade ), point = IFNULL( #{point}, point ), account = IFNULL( #{account}, account ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE member SET nickname = IFNULL( #{nickname}, nickname ), profile_img = IFNULL( #{profileImg}, profile_img ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = ${memberId}
UPDATE member SET email = IFNULL( #{email}, email ), email_confirm = IFNULL( #{emailConfirm}, email_confirm ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = ${memberId}
UPDATE member SET password = IFNULL( #{password}, password ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = ${memberId}
